DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pre-operative level sex-hormones use identify varicocele patient expect improvement semen parameter follow varicocelectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Varicocelectomy : Can Sex-hormones Predict Improvements Semen Quality ?
DOC.criteria: Varicocele ( grade 13 ) surgery plan condition At least 18 year age Fever within 3 month first semen sample Malformations urogenital tract Karyotype 46 , XY Y micro deletion Endocrine disease Chronic disease Medications reduce semen quality Epididymitis within 6 month surgery
